original_text: And it was not without an oath. For those who formerly became priests were made such without an oath,
korean_text: 또 예수께서 제사장이 되신 것은 맹세 없이 된 것이 아니니

sentences.original_text: And it was not without an oath.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 맹세 없이 된 것이 아니었습니다.

sentences.original_text: For those who formerly became priests
were made such without an oath,
